title: Inventory Records Management Procedure (PIT-S130-0105) | Yönerge
text: Procedure No PIT-S130-0105V14 Effective Date 13-01-2012 Update Date 13-03-2025 Related Unit / Owner IT / Bilgi Teknolojileri Direktörü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Related Instruction Bilgi Teknolojileri İşlerini Yönetme Yönergesi (IIT-S130-01) Aim To describe the process steps for creating inventory records for hardware and software provided by the IT unit. Scope Covers all IT hardware and software used within the university and provided by the IT unit. Definitions / Abbreviations SAT: Procurement Request IT: Information Technology Implementation Steps Responsibili ty Outputs/Timing 1. 1. Inventory Record Entries 1.1. Received hardware, software, and supplies are grouped. For barcode printing of hardware and fixed-item items, the Finance Department is notified via email regarding the SAT number and the number of barcodes required for the relevant items. This procedure does not apply to small fixed-item items, fixed-item items, and software. Procurement Officer Email / After products are purchased 1.2. Barcodes received by the IT department are affixed to the front right edge of the relevant products, in accordance with the product model number and description in the attached list. Procurement Procurement Officer Barcode 1.3. The barcode number, serial number, model number, model name, and technical specifications of the products are recorded by entering them into the & quot;IT Inventory Application&quot ; according to product groups. Procurement Officer Inventory update /Export 1.4. Units that have submitted requests are notified of the schedule created within the Annual Operating Plan. Procurement Officer SAP Fixed Asset Update 2. Receiving Intra-Year Requests 2.1. Hardware and software received from or provided to users are updated in the IT Inventory Application. Procurement Officer Inventory Update /Product Import and Export 2.2. Unusable fixed assets such as servers, network products, computers, etc. are submitted by their supervisors to the Procurement Officer for export. The Procurement Officer exports the items and updates them in the IT Inventory Application. Procurement Officer Inventory update /Export 2.3. For unusable items, the & quot;Fixed Asset Export Form&quot ; (FFA-S32001-02) is completed and submitted to the Financial Affairs unit.
